name: + or
description:
+ or - is a 2D puzzle game that you can play single player or in local co-op.

Use the magnetic poles to transport the energy and activate the generator through different level.

This is a alpha version of the game, and we are currently working on the final version that will be released on steam.
Any tipe of feedback are welcome!

Control:

WASD: + movement

E: + On/Off

Arrows: - movement

Right Control: - On/Off
